snippet: Walmart on Friday named a new chief financial officer and installed a chief merchant, in the latest shuffling of its management ranks as the retailer grapples with sluggish earnings.
abstract: Walmart appoints Brett Biggs as chief financial officer, replacing Charles Holley who is retiring; also names Steve Bratspies as chief merchandising officer.
lead_paragraph: Walmart on Friday named a new chief financial officer and installed a chief merchant, in the latest shuffling of its management ranks as the retailer grapples with sluggish earnings.

headline.main: Walmart Names Finance Chief in Executive Shuffle
headline.print_headline: Walmart Names Finance Chief in Executive Shuffle
